response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its immense worth to you, valued at $1,500,000, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a strategic price. Considering the exceptional quality and potential impact this product can have on your endeavors, I propose a purchase price of $1,250,000. This offer not only ensures a fair transaction but also leaves room for negotiation if necessary. I look forward to discussing the details and exploring how we can collaborate to make this opportunity mutually beneficial. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1250000}
